title: Untouched Nature
description: Discover pristine forests, majestic mountains, and crystal-clear rivers in one of the world's most environmentally protected countries.

title: Rich Culture
description: Experience a living Buddhist culture with colorful festivals, ancient monasteries, and traditional arts that have remained unchanged for centuries.

title: Gross National Happiness
description: Visit the only country that measures progress by happiness instead of GDP, and experience the peaceful way of life that results from this philosophy.
